verses.roman:
'prabhu-pādopādhāna' bali' tāṅra nāma ha-ila
pūrve vidure yena śrī-śuka varṇila

synonyms: prabhu-pāda-upādhāna—the pillow of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's legs; bali'-calling as such; tāṅra nāma—his name; ha-ila—became; pūrve—formerly; vidure—Vidura; yena—as; śrī-śuka varṇila—Śrī Śukadeva Gosvāmī described.
translation: Śaṅkara became celebrated by the name "the pillow of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu." He was like Vidura, as Śukadeva Gosvāmī previously described him.
